trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for retrieving an instance property.
trans-unit.target: 提供擷取執行個體 (Instance) 屬性的方法和屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Implements the visitor pattern for expressions that do not produce a result value.
trans-unit.target: 針對不會產生結果值的運算式而實作訪客模式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="visitor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="visitor" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result produced by <c>visitor</c>.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的結果類型<c>訪客</c>。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a typed <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" /> that produces a result value of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" /> 的執行個體，這個執行個體會產生特定型別的結果值。

trans-unit.source: Implements the visitor pattern for expressions that produce a result value of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 針對產生特定型別之結果值的運算式而實作訪客模式。

trans-unit.source: A result value of a specific type produced by <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" />.
trans-unit.target: 特定型別的結果值，由 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor" /> 所產生。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="visitor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="visitor" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that defines the instance from which the property should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可定義執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />，應該從此執行個體中擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that defines the instance from which the property should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 可定義執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />，應該從此執行個體中擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: The expression is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此運算式為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The expression is not associated with the command tree of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" />, or its result type is not equal or promotable to the type that defines the property.
trans-unit.target: 運算式未與 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" /> 的命令樹相關聯，或其結果型別不等於或可提升為定義屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: This property expression.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性運算式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new key/value pair based on this property expression.
trans-unit.target: 根據這個屬性運算式建立新的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: A new key/value pair with the key and value derived from the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引鍵/值組，具有衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" /> 的索引鍵和值。

trans-unit.source: In the returned key/value pair, the key is a string value that is the name of the referenced property, and the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression> value is the property expression itself.
trans-unit.target: 傳回索引鍵/值組的索引鍵都是參考的屬性名稱的字串值和<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression>值是本身的屬性運算式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property metadata for the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 取得要擷取之屬性的屬性中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The property metadata for the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之屬性的屬性中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new key/value pair based on this property expression.
trans-unit.target: 根據這個屬性運算式建立新的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: A new key/value pair with the key and value derived from the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引鍵/值組，具有衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression" /> 的索引鍵和值。

trans-unit.source: In the returned key/value pair, the key is a string value that is the name of the referenced property, and the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression> value is the property expression itself.
trans-unit.target: 傳回索引鍵/值組的索引鍵都是參考的屬性名稱的字串值和<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression>值是本身的屬性運算式。
